greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0) = 1; for n >= 1: a(n) = A048673(1+(2*A064216(n))).
comment: When A048673 is represented as a binary tree, then the node k which contains value n = A048673(k) has as its right child a(n) = A048673(2k+1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8192
xref: Same sequence sorted into ascending order: A032766.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 22 2015
